title: The Second Chance
description: The Second Chance to win her heart won’t be easy.We knew each other best.Laney Richmond.The calm to my crazy.My best friend.My heart.I gave her up when she asked me to.And it tore me up inside.It’s hard to know which path is best.But we were together for the wrong reasons.Logan AlexanderThe light to my dark.My first love.A man I trusted to never hurt me.I miss my best friend. I want him back.And I need him now more than ever.
author: Amanda Bailey
